tool_description:
Buy and sell BTC LTC NMC PPC crypto currencies on the leading market cryptonit.net
Build your own trading bot within seconds, buy bitcons or litecoins for USD /EUR and  make money.
This API allows you to perform basic operations at crypto currency market www.cryptonit.net
If you want to get full API please follow official documentation at https://cryptonit.net/tags/documentation
name: Cryptonit - Crypto Currency Exchange
title: Cryptonit - Crypto Currency Exchange

api_list.name: Get BTC/USD orderbook
api_list.description: This method allows you to get all buy and sell order only for USD/BTC trading pair. You can change  bid_currency and ask_currency to get orderbooks for other trading pairs

required_parameters.name: bid_currency
required_parameters.description: may be: btc ltc ppc nmc ftc trc

required_parameters.name: ask_currency
required_parameters.description: may be: usd eur btc ltc

api_list.name: Last BTC/USD price
api_list.description: This request allows you to get last price for BTC/USD trading pair

required_parameters.name: bid_currency
required_parameters.description: bid currency may be usd or eur  btc

required_parameters.name: ask_currency
required_parameters.description: ask currency, maybe btc ltc ppc nmc ftc trc

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: a number of last trader to use while calculating

api_list.name: Get All Orderbook
api_list.description: This request allows you to get all orderbook - all opened  orders for all trading pairs currently settled on the Cryptonit market
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptonit-cryptonit---crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com/rest/public/ccorder"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptonit-cryptonit---crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptonit-cryptonit---crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com/rest/public/ccorder"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptonit-cryptonit---crypto-currency-exchange.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
